1370: Egbertus moved to Corte gracht.A.5 after marriage.
Got married to Sybillia at age 22 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Sybillia, Verthwi, at age 23.
1372: Had a daughter with Sybillia, Hadewigis, at age 24.
1374: Lost son Ludingus when Ludingus was 0 years old.
Sybillia gave birth to their stillborn son Ludingus in 1374.
1377: Had a daughter with Sybillia, Woltwigis, at age 29.
1380: Had a daughter with Sybillia, Natelien, at age 32.
1382: Lost his wife Sybillia while she was giving birth to Uergina in 1382.
